imdb.title: Hunter x Hunter
imdb.plot: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks out his father, who left him when he was younger.

episodes.title: Departure × and × Friends
episodes.plot: Twelve-year-old Gon Freecss catches Whale Island's monster fish, the "Master of the Swamp," to gain permission from his reluctant "aunt" Mito to take the Hunter Exam. Aboard the ship going to the Hunter Exam, Gon meets Leorio and Kurapika.

episodes.title: Test × of × Tests
episodes.plot: If Gon, Leorio, and Kurapika cannot answer an old woman's question correctly, they will be immediately disqualified.

episodes.title: Rivals × for × Survival
episodes.plot: Gon, Kurapika, and Leorio arrive at Zaban City, the venue of the Hunter Exam, where they meet Tonpa another friendly veteran examiners.

episodes.title: Hope × and × Ambition
episodes.plot: Gon befriends Killua. Leorio nearly gives up, but Gon waits for him until Leorio gains the motivation to catch up. Later, the group shares their own reasons of becoming Hunters.

episodes.title: Hisoka × is × Sneaky
episodes.plot: The marathon through the wetlands starts, with Leorio and Kurapika getting separated from Gon and Killua. In the fog, many applicants try to take down Hisoka.

episodes.title: A × Surprising × Challenge
episodes.plot: Gourmet Hunters Menchi and Buhara task the applicants to cook a pork dish with meat from the worlds most dangerous pig for the second phase, to the annoyance of applicants.

episodes.title: Showdown × on × the Airship
episodes.plot: Chairman Netero sees and challenges them to a game that involves getting a ball from him, telling them that they will automatically become Hunters if they succeed.

episodes.title: Solution × Is × Majority Rules?
episodes.plot: For the third phase, the candidates are abandoned at the top of Trick Tower, wherein long-term criminals are kept. They are given 72 hours to get out alive and pass the exam.

episodes.title: Beware × of × Prisoners
episodes.plot: Gon faces off against Sedokan and Majitani faces off against Kurapika who reveals a startling and scary secret.

episodes.title: Trick × to the × Trick
episodes.plot: Leorio has to postpone the start of his match until Kurapika officially ends his. However, his opponent is unconscious and cannot surrender. Leorio eventually begins his match, in which the game is gambling.

episodes.title: Trouble × with the × Gamble
episodes.plot: Leorio's match continues and he struggles to think of bets he is certain to win. Killua faces a serial killer in a fight to the death.

episodes.title: Last x Test of x Resolve!
episodes.plot: The group must spend the 50 hours Leorio gambled away in a confined room. Once they are out, they must decide by majority on which path to take: one takes 45 hours and allows all 5 to pass, the other takes is faster but only 3 can pass.

episodes.title: Letter × From × Gon
episodes.plot: A letter from Gon arrives at Whale Island for Aunt Mito.

episodes.title: Hit × the × Target
episodes.plot: After exiting Trick Tower, the contestants are taken to Zevil Island to begin stage 4. Each contestant picks a number out of a box and must hunt the contestant with that number on the island.

episodes.title: Explosion × of × Deception
episodes.plot: Gon bides his time for the perfect opportunity to steal Hisoka's badge.

episodes.title: Defeat × and × Disgrace
episodes.plot: Kurapika and Leorio are targeted by Hisoka, but they negotiate a truce.

episodes.title: Trap × in × the Hole
episodes.plot: Killua grows tired of having Imori shadowing him so he challenges Imori to a fight.

episodes.title: Big × Time × Interview
episodes.plot: Gon and his friends have been trapped inside a cave by poisonous snakes.

episodes.title: Can't Win × But × Can't Lose
episodes.plot: Gon and his friends have advanced to the final phase of the Hunter Exam.

episodes.title: Baffling Turn × of × Events
episodes.plot: Gon wakes up and finds himself being congratulated by Satotz for being the first person to pass the Hunter Exam.

episodes.title: Some × Brother × Trouble
episodes.plot: After winning the exam everyone is on their path. Gon,kurapika and leorio team up to help killua.

episodes.title: A × Dangerous × Watchdog
episodes.plot: After arriving in the Republic of Podokea, Gon, Leorio, and Kurapika board a tour bus to Kukuroo Mountain, where Killua lives.

episodes.title: The × Guard's × Duty
episodes.plot: To be able to see Killua, Gon and his friends choose to go through the Testing Gate.

episodes.title: The × Zoldyck × Family
episodes.plot: Thanks to Canary's help, Gon and the others get closer to the mansion.

episodes.title: Can't See × If × You're Blind
episodes.plot: Gon and his friends meet the butler, Gotoh, who proposes a game to see if they are worthy enough to be friends with Killua.

episodes.title: Then × and × After
episodes.plot: Aunt Mito receives another letter from Gon.

episodes.title: Arrival × at × the Arena
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua go to the Heaven's Arena, a place where they can train and earn money by fighting other opponents. Gon and Killua quickly advance to the 150th floor, beating their opponents with a single strike.

episodes.title: Nen × and × Nen
episodes.plot: Zushi's mentor, Wing, tells Gon and Killua about the existence of something known as Nen.

episodes.title: Awakening × and × Potential
episodes.plot: In order to break down Hisoka's Nen barrier, Gon and Killua ask Wing to let them awaken their Nen abilities.

episodes.title: Fierce × and × Ferocious
episodes.plot: Gon's first battle in the Heaven's Arena on the 200th story is against Gido, a Nen user.

episodes.title: Destiny × and × Tenacity
episodes.plot: The match between Hisoka and Kastro is about to begin.

episodes.title: A × Surprising × Win
episodes.plot: Kastro creates a double of himself with his mastery of Nen and steals Hisoka's arms.

episodes.title: An × Empty × Threat
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua resume their Nen training.

episodes.title: Power × to × Avenge
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua both defeated Riehvelt and Gido, Hisoka being impressed with Gon in his matches appeared in Gon's way and invite him to be his next opponent.

episodes.title: The × True × Pass
episodes.plot: The fight between Gon and Hisoka begins.

episodes.title: A Big Debt × and × a Small Kick
episodes.plot: After punching Hisoka in the face, Gon returns the tag from the Hunter Exam. Hisoka is ecstatic to see Gon's development.

episodes.title: Ging × and × Gon
episodes.plot: After mastering Nen and becoming a real Hunter, Gon returns to Whale Island with Killua.

episodes.title: Reply × from × Dad
episodes.plot: Gon decides to listen to the cassette tape found inside the small box.

episodes.title: Wish × and × Promise
episodes.plot: Kurapika learns about Nen and finds his first job as a hunter.

episodes.title: Nen × Users × Unite?
episodes.plot: Kurapika and the other job seekers arrive at the home of a human trophy collector and are attacked by an unknown force.

episodes.title: Gathering × of × Heroes
episodes.plot: Kurapika have to survive a mansion. Gon and Killua travel to the Greed Island.

episodes.title: Defend × and × Attack
episodes.plot: The auction is finally about to begin. Gon, Killua and Leorio are working hard to amass enough money to buy Greed Island.

episodes.title: A × Shocking × Tragedy
episodes.plot: The Phantom Troupe takes over the auction site and the merchandise disappears without a trace, along with the guests.

episodes.title: Buildup × to a × Fierce Battle
episodes.plot: The Mafia's secret weapon, the Shadow Beasts, set out to annihilate the Phantom Troupe.

episodes.title: Restraint × and × Vow
episodes.plot: Kurapika has captured a member of the Phantom Troupe.

episodes.title: Chasing × and × Waiting
episodes.plot: Kurapika sends the Boss away to safety, and then waits to confront the Phantom Troupe alone.

episodes.title: Condition × and × Condition
episodes.plot: Kurapika finds himself face to face with Uvogin.

episodes.title: Very × Sharp × Eye
episodes.plot: At the antiques market, Gon discovers a foolproof way to appraise valuable items

episodes.title: Pursuit × and × Analysis
episodes.plot: Gon and the others plan to raise the money they need by collecting the bounties placed on the Troupe.

episodes.title: Ally × and × Sword
episodes.plot: The Phantom Troupe captures Gon and Killua.

episodes.title: A × Brutal × Battlefield
episodes.plot: Kurapika's desire to destroy the Phantom Troupe gets him recruited into a newly formed team of assassins.

episodes.title: Assault × and × Impact
episodes.plot: Zeno and Silva of the legendary Zoldyck family of assassins arrive to eliminate the Phantom Troupe.

episodes.title: Fake × and × Psyche
episodes.plot: The leader of the Phantom Troupe is dead. The sudden news shocks Kurapika, who heads to the auction site in disbelief, determined to confirm it for himself.

episodes.title: Fortunes × Aren't × Right?
episodes.plot: Kurapika recounts the events that have occurred and reveals his new Nen ability.

episodes.title: Alies × and × Lies
episodes.plot: Just as Chrollo's fortune predicted, Hisoka is suspected of betraying the troupe. Meanwhile, Kurapika learns that the Phantom Troupe is still alive. He teams up with his friends to capture Pakunoda.

episodes.title: Beloved × and × Beleaguered
episodes.plot: Chrollo tries to discover Kurapika's whereabouts by using readily available information on Neon.

episodes.title: Initiative × and × Law
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua are captives of the spiders. Kurapika, Melody, and Leorio hatch a plan to capture Chrollo and use him as leverage to force the remaining Spiders to release Gon and Killua.

episodes.title: Signal × to × Retreat
episodes.plot: Kurapika negotiates with Pakunoda to secure the exchange of Gon and Killua. Pakunoda returns to the Troupe's hideout to announce the terms of the exchange to the remaining members.

episodes.title: Bid × and × Haste
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua attend an auction of Greed Island to scout out potential employers hiring Hunters to clear the game.

episodes.title: End × and × Beginning
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua attend the player selection test in a bid to gain access to Greed Island.

episodes.title: Invitation × and × Friend
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua enter Greed Island. There they enter a town and meet other players, where they learn more about the game Greed Island.

episodes.title: Reality? × and × Raw
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua head for Masadora, the City of Magic, in search of spell cards.

episodes.title: A × Hard × Master?
episodes.plot: Biscuit announces to Gon and Killua that she will be their teacher.

episodes.title: Strengthen × and × Threaten
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua wrap up their training, while the Bomber appears before the players who have formed an alliance.

episodes.title: Evil Fist × and × Rock-Paper-Scissors
episodes.plot: Gon continues to hone his special ability by using the Enhancer, Emitter, and Transmuter aura types.

episodes.title: Strategy × and × Scheme
episodes.plot: Killua passes the Hunter Exam on his second attempt and returns to the game. Once reunited, Gon, Killua, and Biscuit begin steadily collecting cards.
In order to stop Genthru from clearing the game, Gon and Killua are asked to join an alliance.

episodes.title: Pirates × and × Guesses
episodes.plot: Gon and his friends meet the pirate boss Razor, but are overwhelmed by his power.

episodes.title: A × Heated × Showdown
episodes.plot: Gon and his friends team up with Hisoka and Goreinu to challenge Razor again. Also helping out is Team Tsezguerra.

episodes.title: Guts × and × Courage
episodes.plot: Gon comes up with a plan to beat Razor, and it requires Killua's help.

episodes.title: Bargain × and × Deal
episodes.plot: Gon, Killua, and Hisoka face Razor head on, and a winner will finally be crowned in this dodgeball showdown.

episodes.title: Chase × and × Chance
episodes.plot: Tsezguerra suggests that Gon and his friends should continue training while his team distracts Genthru.

episodes.title: Insanity × and × Sanity
episodes.plot: Tsezguerra's group does not return to the game and a one-on-one battle ensues with Gon taking on Genthru, Killua battling Sub, and Biscuit taking on Bara.

episodes.title: Victor × and × Loser
episodes.plot: Gon is overwhelmed by Genthru's power, but he isn't backing down.

episodes.title: Ging's Friends × and × True Friends
episodes.plot: Gon, Killua and Biscuit are challenged when they finally get all 99 reserved card slots. An in-game event takes place to win the #00 card. Who will win?

episodes.title: Reunion × and × Understanding
episodes.plot: Recently beating the game his father and friends created, Greed Island, Gon and Killua use the cards they brought back with them to teleport to whom they believe is Gon's father.

episodes.title: Unease × and × Sighting
episodes.plot: Kite is shown a huge severed member which it is believed to be from a Chimera Ant Queen that has grown to the height of two meters. As Gon and Killua join him in his search for the Queen, their fears are confirmed when it starts consuming humans to enhance its army of soldiers.

episodes.title: Very × Rapid × Reproduction
episodes.plot: Kite and his party trace the whereabouts of the Chimera Queen and conclude that it is located in the neo-ludite nation of NGL. As both Kite's group and another separate team of hunters depart to NGL to investigate, the Queen establishes her stronghold and instructs her soldiers to gather a huge number of humans for her to consume in order to give birth to the King.

episodes.title: No × Good × NGL
episodes.plot: Upholding their policy of not allowing any kind of manufactured or artificial material inside their borders, the NGL only allows Kite, Gon, Killua and two other members of their party to enter their country, with the rest forced to stand by and await their return. Meanwhile, the second team of Hunters is attacked by the Chimera Ants, whose human DNA triggers in them a sense of individuality that brings conflict among their ranks.

episodes.title: Evil × and × Terrible
episodes.plot: Gyro's past is revealed. Pokkle and his crew are attacked by Zazan's squad. Kite's crew receives a message sent by Ponzu.

episodes.title: The × Fight × Begins
episodes.plot: Confirming his suspicions, Kite finds clues about the dark side of the NGL and meet Rammot, one of the Chimera Ants. Knowing that much stronger foes await them ahead, Kite declares that Gon and Killua must defeat the enemy by themselves, or they will not be allowed to proceed further with him. Meanwhile, the Chimera Ant commanders take heed of Nen-enhanced humans and make plans to capture them in order to attend the Queen's increasing demands for nutrition.

episodes.title: Kite × and × Slots
episodes.plot: Kite and company arrive at NGL's drug factory and run into Yunju's team, where a fight begins. Meanwhile, Rammot is introduced to Nen.

episodes.title: Inspiration × to × Evolve
episodes.plot: Netero receives an order from the leaders of the world and prepares to eliminate the Ants. Colt and his fellow Ants are eager to learn more about Nen. Gon, Killua, and Kite battle a group of Ants in a one on one battle.

episodes.title: A × Fated × Awakening
episodes.plot: As Gon, Killua and Kite approach the nest, one of the Chimera Ant Royal Guards, Neferpitou, awakens. Upon extracting information from a surviving Hunter, Neferpitou learns the secrets of Nen, including the means to awaken and control it.

episodes.title: Light X and X Darkness
episodes.plot: Heading towards the Chimera Ants' nest, Kite, Gon, and Killua are attacked by Neferpitou. After escaping with Gon thanks to Kite's sacrifice, Killua meets with Chairman Netero and two other pro Hunters sent to exterminate the Chimera Ants.

episodes.title: Promise X and X Reunion
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua meet Knov's student Palm and learn that to earn a place in the Extermination Squad and return to the NGL, they must win against Morel's students Knuckle and Shoot in one month. To increase their chances of winning, Palm asks for Biscuit's help and they start a harsh training routine with her. Meanwhile at the Chimera Ants nest, Shaiapouf, the second Royal Guard awakens.

episodes.title: Duel × and × Escape
episodes.plot: After completing their training, Biscuit sends the exhausted Gon and Killua to face Knuckle. Looking at the condition of their opponents, Knuckle boasts that they could never move him an inch and bets his token on it. However His assumptions are proven wrong when Gon manages to land a powerful hit that knocks him out cold, and after awakening, Knuckle agrees that he will help them with their training until the deadline for returning the token comes. Meanwhile at the nest, Neferpitou focuses herself into reviving Kite for a second chance to fight him and Netero's team ...

episodes.title: Rock-Paper-Scissors × and × Weakness
episodes.plot: As the deadline established by Netero approaches, the Chairman and his companions keep wiping out the Chimera Ant squads one by one and the remaining squad captains try to deal with the problem, while the third member of the royal guard, Menthuthuyoupi is born. Meanwhile, Gon and Killua complete their training and challenge Knuckle for a decisive battle.

episodes.title: Compassion X and X Strength
episodes.plot: Knuckle points out that Gon's Jajanken technique has two major weaknesses, but he keeps using it instead, making use of these flaws to confuse his opponent. However, just as Gon has a chance to deal a finishing blow, he collapses from exhaustion. Killua than carries Gon away, promising to return in the next day for the decisive battle against Knuckle and Shoot. As Gon rests for the upcoming fight, Biscuit approaches Killua and after sparring with him in her most powerful form, she exposes his own biggest flaw.

episodes.title: Interest X and X Curse
episodes.plot: The final duel between Gon and Knuckle begins. Just as he promised, Knuckle does not hold back and uses his special technique on him, forcing Gon to look for a way to defeat him as fast as possible. Meanwhile, Killua confronts Shoot, but he also gets himself in a pinch when his old habit to avoid stronger enemies is triggered.

episodes.title: The Strong X and X the Weak
episodes.plot: The chimera ant king is born earlier than expected, leaving the queen in a critical condition. As the king abandons the nest accompanied by the royal guard, the squadron leaders disband except for a few loyal ones who surrender to Netero's party in exchange for help to save the queen's life. Meanwhile, Shoot and Knuckle, having defeated Gon and Killua, arrive at the NGL to join the others and Killua promises to protect Gon as long as his powers are sealed, decided to leave his side for good once he recovers.

episodes.title: One Wish X and X Two Promises
episodes.plot: Despite all efforts to save the queen, she does not resist her wounds and dies, but not before revealing to Colt the name she had chosen for the king, "Meruem". A final live offspring is found inside her body and Morel offers himself to protect both after he promises that they will never eat humans anymore. As the other squad leaders leave to build their own colonies, the king and the royal guard arrive at the neighboring country of East Gorteau.

episodes.title: Date X with X Palm
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua return to meet Palm, prepared to face her fury upon failing to fulfill their promise, but she decides to forgive them when Gon accepts her request to have a date with her.

episodes.title: Friend X and X Journey
episodes.plot: To protect a helpless Gon, Killua must face off against a powerful chimera ant on his own however Illumi's passive manipulation complicates the fight.

episodes.title: Grudge × and × Dread
episodes.plot: Knuckle and Morel appear to be overwhelmed by the speed of Cheetu's attacks, but they have a chance at victory. Knuckle smiles and says they have intelligence and experience on their side, as Morel exhales white smoke that surrounds all three of them.

episodes.title: A × Lawless × Home
episodes.plot: The Phantom Troupe return to Meteor City only to discover a Zazan has taken over. They infiltrate her palace and face off against her underlings.

episodes.title: Carnage × and × Devastation
episodes.plot: The Phantom Troupe prove to be far more dangerous than the chimera ants had expected. Zazan and Feitan fight to the death. Killua's younger sister, Kalluto, learns how far she still has to go if she wants to be powerful.

episodes.title: Infiltration × and × Selection
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua arrive in a village in East Gorteau but find no trace of the inhabitants. They find and follow bloodstains out of a house only to discover corpses dug up by wild dogs. Killua reveals to Gon that he's realized the true purpose of the national celebration...

episodes.title: Combination × and × Evolution
episodes.plot: Gon is followed by a mysterious foe who unleashes two chimera ants on him - an owl and a bat. They work together and things look bleak for Gon.

episodes.title: Tracking × and × Pursuit
episodes.plot: Knuckle and Shoot attempt to ambush Cheetu, but at the last minute, he changes directions and flees.

episodes.title: Ikalgo × and × Lightning
episodes.plot: Killua is trapped in a nen darts game. The darts materialize only when they pierce his body, so he must come up with a solution to catch them before he bleeds out.

episodes.title: Power × and × Games
episodes.plot: Gon decides to accept Meleoron's offer to become partners. Meleoron reveals his true powers and his plan to defeat the chimera King.

episodes.title: Check × and × Mate
episodes.plot: The King is killing time as he awaits the selection. He calls upon masters of shogi and go and defeats every one of them. The next person he calls is a blind girl by the name of Komugi, who is the world champion of Gungi, the national game of East Gorteau.

episodes.title: Doubt × and × Hesitation
episodes.plot: Knov is making his way to the palace. The Chimera Ants Leol and Flutter follow him to try to determine his abilities, but they lose sight of him. Meanwhile, after being hindered by Cheetu's Nen Abilities, Morel prepares for a counterattack. As the fierce battles between Chimera Ants and Hunters continue, the King and Komugi continue to play Gungi.

episodes.title: Resolve × and × Awakening
episodes.plot: The King is annoyed and confounded after meeting Komugi, the unfathomable Gungi world champion. But at the same time, he is having fun. He proposes a wager with Komugi. If Komugi wins, he'll give her whatever she wants. If she loses, he wants...

episodes.title: Knov × and × Morel
episodes.plot: Knov infiltrates the palace. His goal is to place the exits for his ability, the Fourth Dimensional Mansion. But just as he is about to climb the Central Staircase he is stopped in his tracks by a heavy and ominous aura seeping from the floor above.

episodes.title: Return × and × Retire
episodes.plot: Morel has been chased into an underground church by the lion-type Chimera Ant, Leol. Leol activates his Nen Abilities and produces a giant wave and a surfboard. Morel then reveals that those are his friend's abilities. Furious, he begins his counterattack.

episodes.title: Gungi × of × Komugi
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua have gained new allies and prepare to charge into battle. Meanwhile, the King and Komugi continue to play Gungi. Shaiapouf notices how exhausted Komugi is and suspects that it's only a matter of time before she loses.

episodes.title: Taking Stock × and × Taking Action
episodes.plot: Gon and his friends prepare to infiltrate the palace; inside the palace, the chimera ant king wrestles with his growing conscience.

episodes.title: Confusion × and × Expectation
episodes.plot: Welfin, a wolf-like Chimera Ant, has realized that someone has infiltrated the palace. He notices that secretary Bizeff and Palm have disappeared and searches for them. With his sharp sense of smell, he tracks down the intruders.

episodes.title: Charge × and × Invade
episodes.plot: Netero along with Zeno launches attack on king's castle to separate him from royal guards.

episodes.title: Monster × and × Monster
episodes.plot: Zeno and Netero's sudden attack throws the palace into confusion; concerned for the king's safety, Pitou and Pouf hurry to the king's side.

episodes.title: An × Indebted × Insect
episodes.plot: Gon and his friends have charged into the palace. Youpi transforms and splits up the group with his attack. Morel lets Shoot and Knuckle handle things while he heads for the King.

episodes.title: Divide × and × Conquer
episodes.plot: The chimera ant king faces off against Netero and Zeno; Shoot fights with Youpi.

episodes.title: Duty × and × Question
episodes.plot: Knuckle suddenly appears before Youpi to fight him head-on.

episodes.title: Revenge × and × Recovery
episodes.plot: Gon explodes into anger on seeing Neferpitou. He is further aggravated by Pitou's request to delay their fight in order to heal Komugi.

episodes.title: Insult × and × Payback
episodes.plot: Feeling the need to lay a punch on Youpi to avenge his friend Shoot, Knuckle decides to take on Youpi once more.

episodes.title: A × False × Rage
episodes.plot: Menthuthuyoupi fakes his rage in order to draw Knuckle out. Meanwhile, Ikalgo is unable to find Palm and is encountered by the suspicious Bloster

episodes.title: Strong × or × Weak
episodes.plot: Killua puts on a show of strength. Will it be enough to take down Youpi? Meanwhile Ikalgo tries to outsmart Bloster.

episodes.title: Fake × and × Real
episodes.plot: Pouf escapes Morel's smoke jail, and reveals his powers. He also learns of all that he missed till now. Morel, faces a setback, just when Youpi and Knuckle run into him.

episodes.title: Defeat × and × Dignity
episodes.plot: Morel and Knuckle try to hold off Youpi as long as they can. But little did they realize how much Youpi has transformed after being able to control his rage. Meanwhile, Pouf reaches the room where Gon and Pitou are.

episodes.title: Pose × and × Name
episodes.plot: Pouf sticks to the plan of finding the King. He sends a fly to meet up with Youpi, whose already on the way. Far away, Netero and the King get ready for battle, though the King demands something else.

episodes.title: Centipede × and × Memory
episodes.plot: Ikalgo remembers his mission to find Palm.

episodes.title: Breakdown X and X Awakening
episodes.plot: Palm finally awakens from her cocoon after being captured by the Chimera Ants only to encounter Killua and begin a heated battle.

episodes.title: Great Power × and × Ultimate Power
episodes.plot: Gon presses to Neferpitou the remaining ten minutes for Komugi's recovery. Meanwhile, King Meruem and Chairman Netero continue on their battle, succumbing into an underground tomb, which Netero states will be Meruem's tomb.

episodes.title: Zero × and × Rose
episodes.plot: Netero and the King's fierce battle continues. The King feels fear for the first time and Netero demonstrates the zenith of nen mastery.

episodes.title: Hostility × and × Determination
episodes.plot: Pitou completes Komugi's treatment and Gon forces her to accompany him to Peijing in order to restore Kaito's mind, while Komugi stays behind with Killua and the others. Meanwhile, Pouf and Youpi reach the site of Netero's battle with Meruem and can't hide their feelings of sadness upon finding their king's maimed body.

episodes.title: Unparalleled Joy × and × Unconditional Love
episodes.plot: Pouf and Youpi use part of their own bodies to heal Meruem, who revives stronger than before, but missing most of his memories and Pouf decides to take advantage of the situation to dispose of Komugi in order to ensure that he does not remember her at all. Meanwhile, the other hunters learn, much to their horror, that the king is still alive and is returning to the palace.

episodes.title: Formidable Enemy × and × Clear Objective
episodes.plot: As Meruem approaches the palace, Pouf continues his search for Komugi until he finds her under Killua's guard. Claiming that he intends to rescue her, Pouf convinces her to resist against Killua to give him an opening to kill her instead, but Killua realizes this and successfully protects her from him. Meanwhile, Gon and Pitou are about to reach Kite's location.

episodes.title: Magic × to × Destroy
episodes.plot: As Meruem returns to the palace, the remaining hunters conceal their presence while Gon and Pitou come across Kite. In the occasion, Pouf contacts Pitou and lies to her, claiming that Komugi was rescued thus it does not need to obey Gon anymore. However, when Gon asks Pitou to heal Kite, the Chimera explains that he was dead all along, only moving under the influence of its powers, much to his despair.

episodes.title: Anger × and × Light
episodes.plot: Gon goes beyond his body limits to achieve monstrous power. Neferpitou (Pitou) become overwhelmed by Gon's New power. Kilua rushes to Gon in order to save him from Pitou.

episodes.title: Flash × and × Start
episodes.plot: Mereum searches for his lost memories, but Pouf and Youpi worry his memory of Komugi will return; the King captures Knuckle and Meleoron.

episodes.title: Deadline × to × Live
episodes.plot: Welfin encounters Youpi on his way to negotiate a hostage exchange with the king; Mereum's memories start to return; Palm and Ikalgo continue hiding Komugi, hoping to outlast the deteriorating king.

episodes.title: The Word × Is × You
episodes.plot: A conversation with Welfin stirs Mereum's memories of Komugi, sending him off on a new objective.

episodes.title: This Person × and × This Moment
episodes.plot: Meruem tries once more to beat Komugi in gungi.

episodes.title: Homecoming × and × Real Name
episodes.plot: Reina returns to NGL to find her mom. Colt reveals something intriguing to Morel. Killua is afraid of losing Gon, who is in a critical state.

episodes.title: Debate × Among × Zodiacs
episodes.plot: The 12 Zodiacs meet following the Netero's order to hold an election.

episodes.title: Plea X and X Favor
episodes.plot: Pariston takes advantage of the electoral stalemate to bend the rules in his favor; Killua turns to family for a solution to Gon's condition.

episodes.title: Alluka X and X That Thing
episodes.plot: Killua attempts to convince his family to allow his sister, Alluka, to leave the estate so she can use her powers to save Gon's life; Illumi wants to prevent Killua's plan from succeeding.

episodes.title: Join Battle X and X Open Battle
episodes.plot: As the Hunter Association tries in vain to help Gon, Killua secures a deal with his family to allow Alluka out of the mansion so that she can treat Gon.

episodes.title: Magician × and × Butler
episodes.plot: Leorio's exploits prove an asset during the elections when he becomes favored to win; Illumi and Hisoka target Killua in a plot to kill Alluka.

episodes.title: Needle × and × Debt
episodes.plot: Gotoh is killed by Hisoka, while Tsubone, Amane, and Canary continue to chase after Killua. Killua with the help of Morel sends a group of Hunters to capture Illumi.

episodes.title: Sin × and × Claw
episodes.plot: The voting narrows to eight candidates; Illumi watches Killua and attempts to pry Alluka's secrets out of him; the hunters seeking Illumi run afoul of Hisoka.

episodes.title: Approval × and × Coalition
episodes.plot: The elections come down to the wire as a healthy Gon arrives; family members unite.

episodes.title: Defeat × and × Reunion
episodes.plot: The elections come down to the wire as a healthy Gon arrives; family members unite.

episodes.title: Chairman × and × Release
episodes.plot: Gon's regrets dampen a heartfelt reunion; Pariston renounces his victory to give the chairmanship to someone else; Killua makes a decision about what to do with Alluka's powers.

episodes.title: Salvation × and × Future
episodes.plot: Gon and Killua apologize to Kite for the role they played in his death. Gon later heads out to meet up with Ging on the World Tree.

episodes.title: Past X and X Future
episodes.plot: Reunion of long awaited father and son, and what journey awaits for them ahead.
